title: Reaction to Tom Brady to Bucs & Philip Rivers signing with Colts
itunes:title: Reaction to Tom Brady to Bucs & Philip Rivers signing with Colts
description:
DJ and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys discuss the news of QB Tom Brady agreeing to join the Buccaneers, while looking at his fit with the team and what's next for the Patriots (:40). Next, the pair break down why Philip Rivers signed with the Colts (12:21). After that, the duo talk about the Raiders most recent moves in free agency (18:37). Then, the guys explain the challenges of picking players that weren't invited to the combine (22:55). To wrap up the show, the pair discuss some more free agency moves and talk about how there's so many trades lately (26:40).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
